title: Hirred
description: Developed a dynamic Job Application Platform that allows job seekers to explore job listings, submit applications, and track their application status.Implemented RESTful APIs for seamless client-server communication and JWT/Firebase Authentication for secure user access.

title: Learning Pedia
description: A comprehensive full-stack web Application designed to transform how students organise, share, and access lecture materials. Features include multi-format uploads/downloads (PDF, DOCX, TXT) OCR-based text extraction from handwritten/printed notes, and secure authentication using email/Password
